title: The Lost Dinosaur Egg – Kids find a dinosaur egg and go on an adventure to return it.

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: A group of kids exploring the woods on a sunny day, Character Action: One of the kids stumbles upon a large, mysterious egg half-buried in the ground, Dialogue: 'Guys, come over here! You won’t believe what I found!', Narration: 'An ordinary day in the woods takes a surprising turn.'

output.Setting: A sunlit forest clearing with kids looking curiously at a half-buried egg.
output.Character Action: One child kneels by the egg, waving for others to come over.
output.Dialogue: "Guys, come over here! You won’t believe what I found!"
output.Narration: An ordinary day in the woods takes a surprising turn.

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Close-up of the mysterious egg, covered in unusual patterns and textures, Character Action: The kids crowd around the egg, fascinated, Dialogue: 'It looks like… a dinosaur egg?!', Narration: 'Could this really be from a dinosaur?'

output.Character Action: The kids examine the egg closely, eyes wide in wonder.
output.Dialogue: "It looks like… a dinosaur egg?!"
output.Narration: Could this really be from a dinosaur?

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Forest clearing with the kids discussing what to do next, Character Action: One of the kids suggests they need to find where it belongs, Dialogue: 'If it’s really a dinosaur egg, we have to take it back!', Narration: 'A plan to return the egg is set in motion.'
